mapper.select: SELECT cid, starttime, endtime, FROM ordercr

SELECT ordercr.orderid, ordercr.cid, s.snum, s.sname, ordercr.starttime, ordercr.endtime, ordercr.theme, ordercr.faculty, ordercr.groupname, ordercr.teacher, ordercr.stelephone, ordercr.attendcount, ordercr.orderstatus, ordercr.createtime FROM ordercr LEFT JOIN student s ON ordercr.snum = s.snum
